ygData.subject: Re: Bards in Unrest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I know it s been bugged and demonstrated to GM s several times, as there are also nasty Z axis bugs in many other dungeons. The tower in the undead part of
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Jul 21/99, "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...> wrote:
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> A similar thing happened to me twice when I was camping behind the back
> porch. One time, my group was resting after a fight. I had been using
> Denon's Discord during the previous fight. While everyone is resting, the
> back door opens up and a festering hag makes a beeline towards me. Next
> thing I know she zaps me for 300+ hit points and I'm dead. If there is a
> bug with the axis whatever is it something that Verant is aware of and is
> working on fixing?

I know it's been bugged and demonstrated to GM's several times, as there
are also nasty Z axis bugs in many other dungeons. The tower in the
undead part of Lower Guk is well known for this. As to whether it's
being worked on, as it's been bugged it's probably on their todo list
but the only indication we ever get as to whether they are actually
working on it is when announcements show up in the test server patch
notes that they think they have fixed it. I guess they feel that
publishing a list of known bugs with the priority of the bug fix would
not be to thier benefit.
